session_info.name: FRXCA - Invited Oral Presentations, Beam Instrumentation, Controls, Feedback & Oper.

papers.title: Passive Streaking Using Transverse Wakefield for Ultrashort Bunch Diagnostics
authors: et al. PHYSICAL REVIEW ACCELERATORS AND BEAMS 19
papers.abstract: This talk will describe the experimental demonstration of the use of transverse wakes to passively streak a relativistic electron beam. The reconstruction method used to recover the temporal profile of the electron bunch will be presented and the limitations of the technique as a diagnostics discussed.
